Action.author: ashish.cppdev
Action.body: For some reason, once I uninstalled docker and reinstalled it, the script ran successfully, all the way to the end. I am happy that it works now, but do not know why it kept failing earlier. In any case, I will close this ticket.

Action.author: ashish.cppdev
Action.body: Uninstalling and reinstalling docker worked towards the resolution. Still do not know the root cause but it was connected with docker.
